Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, running north to south through the shopping centers.
Room.LongDescription: The Main Street shopping centers are known for their exquisite quality goods and services. There is a large complex to the east which is accessible from Main Street to the north. To the west, there is a small building with thick smoke bubbling out from under the door. A faint sign above the door says "Nevermore Alchemy".
